news.title: Title One
news.p: Darshan Timings has been revised due to unexpected crowd in the temple.
Now People travelling from different stated have an edge in the timings of ayodhya ram mandir darshan.

news.title: Gold Crown of Ram:
news.p: The decoration that has happend in the temple is made up of gold and ornaments that used on God Ram is gold and it was most         expensive one.
The temple is made up of different chemicals so the age is almost of 1000 years.

news.title: Hundi Collections:
news.p: Hundi was completely full in half day of first day darshan in ayodhya
It was one of the most fastest hundi that was completely full in ayodhya ram mandir
